item.title: Unite the Rails
item.description: When Leland Stanford hammered in the golden spike at Promontory Summit, Utah, connecting the Central Pacific Railroad and Union Pacific Railroad track...

item.title: A Visit to Sarasota’s Ringling Museum
item.description: It’s both whimsical and serious, though its website is awful. And, Governor DeSantis, don’t mess with its governance.

item.title: New York Times Coverage Avoids the Third Rails of Sex Trafficking
item.description: We must not ignore the role of illegal immigration and abortion.

item.title: It Is Time to Be Done with Shutdowns
item.description: We’re five weeks into a government shutdown. It should be the last one.

item.title: The Nationalization of Elections Is Anti-American
item.description: Our Founding Fathers fought for our right not to care about who New Jersey elects as governor.
